feedback: Well done on successfully implementing the reverse functionality for both arrays and lists! The code is mostly clear, but you could improve the readability of the `reversed(List<Integer> list)` method by leveraging Java's built-in methods, specifically using `Collections.reverse()` instead of invoking a non-existent `reversed()` method on the list. Also, consider adding comments to explain your logic, especially for future developers. Keep up the good practice of returning new copies rather than mutating the originals!
